data.text: @mayank9sancheti Thanks for your Tweet, Mayank. It may help to know that our carry-on baggage limit is 7kg per passenger and cannot be combined with other passengers on your booking. Please see https://t.co/wPBqWkVn6M for more information. –M

@lifewithgladys I’m sorry to hear about your recent experience with us at Chiang Airport Gladys. We do train all staff to be professional and friendly at all times so it’s disappointing if this isn’t the level of service you received. We value your feedback for further service improvement. - J
@lmdo Hi Linh, thanks for the tweet. So we could check this for you, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen
@tangerinesmoke Hi there, thanks for the tweet. Just letting you know that I've responded to your DM. Regards - Yen
@Angelfrade Hi Angel, thanks for the tweet. So that we can check this further, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. We'll see how we can assist. Regards - Yen
@cabelle03 Hi Camille, I've responded to your DM. -Camille
@RSKo714 Hi There, thanks for the tweet. You may wish to check our deals here https://t.co/D8EHpyZDLx for more information. Hope this helps. Regards - Yen

data.text: @macoc2747 4/6 clip was released by one of  ISS Security Staff Members, who is Jetstar’s outsourced security agents. They have been warned of the release as well. As a result of this, AOT has arrested the offender and sent to Saku Police Station accordingly.”

@macoc2747 3/6 and is part of  our security measurement, where an investigator was sent to record this incident.  We have been coordinating this operation with Tourism Police and the concerned parties in the effort to stop such burglary in the aircraft compartment. We suspect that the video

@macoc2747 2/6 media on this incident, which is below and our rough translation.  “AOT is aware of a video clip circulating on social media regarding the pilferage of passenger bags in aircraft compartment. AOT would like to advise that the incident happened at Phuket International Airport

@macoc2747 1/6 Hi Ma. We are aware of the video you mention, about an incident that happened at Phuket airport. The baggage handler you see in the video works for BAGS, which provides baggage services to 90 airlines in Thailand. Airports of Thailand (AOT) has issued a statement to Thai

@travellingmayan Hi there, thanks for the reply. I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience with us. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name and we'll see on how we can assist. Regards - Joie

@travellingmayan Hi. Due to operational requirements and strict safety standards.  It is sometimes unavoidable that a flight is delayed on the day you’re due to travel. I hope you can appreciate that safety is our #1 priority. I sincerely apologised for the inconvenience. Thanks - H

data.text: @daga_agad Hi Devika, I’ve responded to your Tweet in our Jetstar Airways page. –M

@lloydthelostboy Hi Lloyd, It may help to know that we've recently updated our credit card verification policy and can advise that debit/credit card verification is no longer required for SIN-MNL flights. Thanks - Chichi

@SimonSteerJones Hi Simon, Thanks for the reply. In order to offer you every day low fares we must keep our operating costs as low as possible. We offer our customers the choice of extras they want without paying for the things they don’t. We appreciate the feedback. Regards - Joie

@SimonSteerJones Hi Simon, sorry to hear that you've been uncomfortable on your recent flight with us. It may help to know that we offer our customers the opportunity to request a specific seat during booking process or via Manage booking. Sorry if you're unaware of this. Thanks - Yen

@MF_emeir Hi there, sorry to hear that you weren't able to log in to your account. So we could check this for your, kindly send us a DM along with your email address and full name. We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Yen

@WorldPeace24_7 Hi there, thanks for the tweet and I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience with us at Clark Airport. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can further assist. Regards - Joie

@OsborneSlieve Hi there, thanks for the reply. It may also help to know that the design of our aircraft is in line with other low cost business load carriers. We appreciate your feedback. Regards – Joie
@OsborneSlieve Our management team is always open to new ideas. For any company to evolve, it is essential for our customers to provide feedback about all parts of our business. –M 2/2
@OsborneSlieve It may help to know that our Air Bus A320 has a seat width of 45cm (18 inches), height of 117cm (46 inches) and pitch of 71cm (28 inches). 1/2
@OsborneSlieve I’m sorry to hear this, Aindrias. Could you please DM your booking reference and full name so I can check this further and see how I can assist? –M
@sweetweet213 Hi Vishnu, thanks for your tweet. To assist you further, can you please provide more details via DM? Thanks - Chichi

@angathome06 Hi there, thanks for the tweet. Yes, there are still flights from Singapore to Phuket. Regards – Joie
@Airwaysfoodie Hi Steven, thanks for your tweet. Hope you enjoyed your flight from Singapore. :) Cheers - Lee

@DivaMirandaOR Hi Diva.  Online check-in is not available for international flights. Please check in at the airport and present identification to collect your boarding pass before check-in closes. For more details please check here: https://t.co/Z8t6clPTM1 Thanks - H

data.text: @niteinpodcast We value your feedback and use it to drive improvement to our service so we appreciate your comments. –M 2/2

@niteinpodcast Sorry to hear this Muky. We consistently monitor our staff levels at peak periods and are training new staff. While our staff do their best to attend to all customers need, delays can still occur. 1/2
@sunnyboyrohit Hi Rohit. As your booking was booked by a travel agency, you will need to contact them for your booking reference under your flight with Jet Airways. Thanks - H
@anneneu_18 Hi Ane, thanks for the tweet. We've responded to your DM. Thanks - Yen
@Makesmehappy227 Hi there. The social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to DM us in English so we can assist? Regards - Joie
@JeffTheWanderer Thanks for the Tweet. Hope you’ll enjoy your flight from Darwin to Singapore with us. :) –M
@kennyothechef Hi Ken. I've already responded to your DM. Thanks - H

@veeveeunn Thanks for your reply. I know it doesn’t change the situation for you but I can assure you that we wouldn’t have made the change unless it was necessary. Passengers and crew is our number one priority. Please be assure that we value your feedback so we can continue to improve. -J
@AnicoHanna 2/2 If you can send through the details and photos to our Baggage Services team here: https://t.co/Ns3im9z6K3 they can formally review this and contact you directly. Thanks – Jerry

@AnicoHanna 1/2 I’m sorry to hear about your baggage. . Please be assured that we go to great lengths to take care of each piece of baggage, so I appreciate how upsetting it is if this doesn't happen. Please accept my apologies.

@veeveeunn Hi there. Sorry to hear that your flight was delayed. We aim all flights get away on time but it isn't always possible due to our strict safety standards. I sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused. Thanks - H

data.text: @dellasukmaa Hi there, thanks for the tweet. I've responded to your DM, kindly check. Thanks - Yen

@vickio1992 Hi Vicki. We’re unable to provide any baggage cost as prices aren't static, they can vary from time to time, like fare prices, and are not fixed. The cheapest way to add checked baggage is at the time of booking as price will increase after booking. Regards – Lee

@vickio1992 Hi Vicki. Checked baggage prices vary by route. Prices are cheapest when you purchase a checked baggage allowance online, and most expensive at the airport. You may check the cost of the baggage by managing your booking online here: https://t.co/tLzP8ZsyaC. Thanks - H
@aryudananta Hi there, thanks for the tweet. We've responded to your DM. Thanks - Yen

@ANGELISMTWEET Our management team is always open to new ideas. For any company to evolve, it is essential for our customers to provide feedback about all parts of our business - so we appreciate your comments. –M
@PallaviPathania Hi Pallavi, sorry to hear this. If you could DM us your booking reference and full name so we can take a look at how we can assist further. Thanks - Lee
@rollymnn Thanks for the tweet, Rolly. I'm glad to hear that you are no longer receiving this. I sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this may have caused. Thanks - Yen

@rollymnn Sorry to hear this, Rolly. As you may appreciate, we have a system in place to notify customers with their pending bookings. But once the booking isn’t completed or no payment processed, it will automatically be cancelled and no email reminder will be sent to you. –M
@JASMINiWORLD Could you please DM your booking reference and full name so I can check this further and see how I can assist? –M 2/2

@JASMINiWORLD Sorry to hear this, Jasmin. We try to ensure that all your luggage and belongings will be returned to you immediately after you've arrived at your destination. I can appreciate how upsetting it is if this doesn't happen. Please accept my apologies. 1/2

@kcbudhraja Thanks for the Tweet, Kavita. We go to great lengths to try and provide passengers with excellent customer service and it’s so rewarding for our team to have their work recognised in such a thoughtful way. –M

@josettehenyo Hi Josette, thanks for the tweet. Social Media Team may be able to assist you with adding baggage to your booking. Kindly DM us your booking reference and full name so we can further assist. Thanks - Yen
@DeeSummers Hi Dee, thanks for the tweet. I can see that we've already responded to your other tweet. Kindly check. Thanks - Yen
@connercombs16 Thanks for the tweet, Conner. We've responded to your DM. Thanks - Yen

@ANGELISMTWEET Thanks for the tweet and I’m sorry to hear you’ve been disappointed. I hope you can appreciate that in order to offer our everyday low fares, we make checked baggage, meals, comfort packs and entertainment an optional extras. Thanks – Yen
